ygData.subject: RE: 7th Level Qeynos Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: You might want to try getting a guide to Rivervale. The Misty Thicket is a great place for hunting up to about lvl 10.
ygData.messageBody:
You might want to try getting a guide to Rivervale. The Misty Thicket is a
great place for hunting up to about lvl 10.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Clarkson, Ron L [SMTP:clarkrl3@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 8:26 AM
> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] 7th Level Qeynos Blues
>
> From: "Clarkson, Ron L" <clarkrl3@...>
>
> OK. I am a 7th level monk travelling through the Qeynos area on the new
> Tribunal server. I've run into a stump, though. It seems to me that
> everything in the area is now either conning green or conning yellow (few
> and far between). However, if I go to different zones, it's instant red
> cons. Any suggestions on getting over this level hump?
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: the best place to EXPLORE topics, SHARE ideas, and
> CONNECT to people with the same interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
